attributes.action: No Gypsies/Irish Travellers on Green Belt Land
attributes.additional_details:
Green Belt Land should NOT be developed but especially Gypsies/Irish Travellers SHOULD NOT be allowed to take over Green Belt Land under ANY circumstances.

The use of the Equality Act and Human Rights to justify the Gypsies/Irish Travellers use of Green Belt Land should be thrown out of court - it is a joke!

Green Belt Land belongs to the people to enjoy not for the Gypsies/Irish Travellers to take over.
